Battleship Chess v2.1 is not Vista Compatible (you'll only get a white windowed screen), which is why v2.2 was released. Here's how to get around it easily:

1. Install v2.1 normally (this torrent)
2. Install the v2.2 demo from apezone.com in a different folder
3. Replace audiere.dll from 2.1 with the same file from the 2.2 demo
